layout.title: Digital Solutions for Thai Massage & Spa Businesses | VoucherStore
layout.description: Complete digital solutions for Thai massage and spa businesses. Websites, online booking, gift vouchers, AI receptionist, and reputation management - all in one place.

hero.title: Your Complete Online Solution. Fully Managed For You.
hero.text: Missing calls during treatments? Spending evenings managing bookings? Paying for ads that don't convert? You're losing money and time every single day. There's a better way.

logos.heading: Trusted by Thai Massage Businesses Worldwide

services.title: Everything Your Thai Massage Business Needs
services.text: We're not a marketing agency that takes your money and runs. We're not software you struggle with alone. We're a complete, done-for-you service that gives you everything Thai massage businesses need to compete online—professionally built, fully managed, always improving. Build the foundation right, then everything else works. Here's what you get:

items.title: Professional Website
items.text: Beautiful, fast-loading website built for Thai massage businesses. Mobile-friendly, Google-optimised, and designed to convert visitors into bookings. Everything handled for you.

items.title: Local SEO
items.text: Show up when customers search 'Thai massage near me' on Google. We handle the optimization, you get discovered by local clients ready to book.

items.title: AI Receptionist
items.text: Answers every call and message instantly—even when you're hands-on with clients. Available 24/7 in multiple languages. Every enquiry gets a response.

items.title: Online Booking System
items.text: Clients book themselves anytime, day or night. Your calendar fills automatically, confirmations send instantly, and double-bookings become impossible. Simple.

items.title: Gift Voucher Management
items.text: Customers buy gift vouchers directly from your website. The system handles payments, delivery, and tracking automatically. Pure profit, zero admin.

items.title: Review Automation
items.text: Turn happy clients into 5-star Google reviews effortlessly. The system makes it easy for them to leave feedback, boosting your visibility and credibility.

services.bottomText: We set everything up, train your team, and provide ongoing support. No technical skills required, no extra work for you. You focus on clients. We handle the rest.

whoWeAre.header: We're on a mission to support Thai massage businesses across the West with technology that's powerful, affordable, and actually simple to use. Your success is our success. Your growth is what drives us.
whoWeAre.title: Built By People Who Understand You
whoWeAre.text: I'm Kris, originally from Thailand and now living in the UK. I've seen too many brilliant Thai massage therapists remain invisible online or waste thousands of pounds on marketing services and campaigns that simply do not yield results. That's why I built ThaiSpaPro with Andrew, my partner.
list: Built specifically for Thai massage businesses

cta.title: Ready To Grow Your Business Together?

items.text: VoucherStore transformed our business completely. Our new website looks amazing, bookings have tripled, and the gift voucher system has become a major revenue stream. Everything is automated - we just focus on our clients now.
items.name: Nong Smith
items.title: Owner, Thai Serenity Spa, London

items.text: The AI receptionist is incredible - it answers every call perfectly in both English and Thai. We're ranking #1 on Google Maps now and getting 40+ bookings per week just from online. Best investment we ever made.
items.name: Som Johnson
items.title: Manager, Lotus Thai Massage, Manchester

pricing.title: Find The Right Plan For You
pricing.text: All plans include complete setup, hosting, support, and unlimited edits. Choose what fits your business now, upgrade later as you grow. We handle all the technical work. You focus on your clients.
